kuno.description: The root configuration object for Kuno

cookieAuthentication.description: Options for integrated cookie authentication.  All nodes in the collection will use these cookies and must share a domain name.  One service must create the auth tickets.

authenticationScheme.description: The name of the authentication scheme.
authenticationScheme.title: Authentication Scheme

dataProtectionKey.description: A key that is used to encrypt the cookie
dataProtectionKey.title: Data Protectin Key

expireTimeSpan.description: The sliding expiration of the cookie.
expireTimeSpan.title: Expiration

subscriptions.description: An subscriptions that this instance should connect to.

local.description: The local URL of this service.  This is the URL that the publisher will call.  Do not include the path.
local.title: Local URL

remote.description: The remote URLs to subscribe to.

apiKeyAuthentication.description: Options to enable API key authentication.

allow.description: Set to true to allow API key authentication.

key.default: A key to decrypt the header value.
